content: there are a total of three cable hearts around the cup cozy there is a simple 11 stitch repeat to get the hearts and the cozy fits your standard cup i have included a rough diagram sketch to help you visualize the pattern this cozy is extra special to me because i designed it to be my wedding favor for guests enjoy your new cable heart cup cozy connect with me here 1 i do not charge for my patterns but if you would like to support my work you can tip me on venmo @thoseyellowthings 1 https //www flowcode com/page/thoseyellowthings
